form: [{'type':'title','name':'Antecedentes Familiares'},{'type':'radio','label':'¿El paciente presenta antecedentes familiares de psoriasis?','css':'col-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-xl-12','name':'familyHistoryPsoriasis','placeholder':'','radioButton':[{'optionName':'Sí','value':true},{'optionName':'No','value':false}]},{'type':'table','label':'Tabla de antecedentes familiares','name':'familyHistoryTable','hidden':true,'hiddenWhen':['familyHistoryPsoriasis',true],'actions':[{'name':'edit','icon':'edit-2'},{'name':'delete','icon':'trash'},{'name':'detail','icon':'eye'}],'button':'add','placeholder':'','columns':4,'fields':[{'type':'select','label':'Grado de parentesco','name':'degreeKinship','disabled':false,'placeholder':'','options':[{'name':'1º Grado','value':'1º Grado'},{'name':'2º Grado','value':'2º Grado'},{'name':'3º Grado','value':'3º Grado'},{'name':'Otros','value':'Otros'}]},{'type':'select','label':'principalIndication','name':'typePsoriasis','disabled':false,'placeholder':'','endpoint':'/indications'},{'type':'input','label':'Edad en el diagnóstico','name':'ageDiagnosis','disabled':false,'placeholder':'edad'},{'type':'input','label':'Observaciones','name':'observations','disabled':false,'placeholder':'observaciones'}]},{'type':'section','name':''},{'type':'radio','label':'¿El paciente presenta antecedentes familiares de alguna otra patología de interés?','name':'textFamilyHistoryAnotherPathologyInterest','css':'col-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-xl-12','disabled':false,'placeholder':'','radioButton':[{'optionName':'Sí','value':true},{'optionName':'No','value':false}]},{'type':'textarea','label':'Observaciones','css':'col-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-xl-12','name':'textFamilyHistoryAnotherPathologyInterestObservation','disabled':true,'placeholder':'','validation':'Validators.required','enableWhen':['textFamilyHistoryAnotherPathologyInterest',true]}]
